website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 70 is a fun instant camera with a selfie mode, but fully automatic operation may disappoint shutterbugs.
cons: Film is pricey for volume shooters

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but very fun
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a wedding present to use on our honeymoon. (The blue was very appropriate for the Mediterranean!) It is so much fun to use and we've got a lot of great snaps. Yes, the film is crazy expensive, but you aren't going to use this camera as you would a normal one. We found out the hard way it's impossible to capture a good picture of a sunset (or indeed any thing with the sun in it) and yet needs a lot of light to work (despite the "high key" some photos did come out very dark) but you learn to work around it. Definitely a great little piece of kit, perfect for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedding Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Maid Of Honour gift for my friend's wedding. I created my DIY photobooth with lots of stickers and a lovely photo album, that all guests have filled using photo made with Instax Mini! I love this camera! The flash is absolutely amazing. The density of the colours, contrast, sharpness all incredible. I can truly recommend it to anyone thinking of a great product that captures memories and moods in time.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Raja

customer_reviews.title: My new obsession
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera, I opened it as soon as it arrived, super intuitive to use (especially so if you're already into photography) simple to use and set up. Given 4/5 for quality of photos purely because, well, it's an instant camera. You can't expect pin sharp perfect photos everytime but I am so so happy with the results so far. I've seen a lot of reviews that really bash instax and sadly it's probably because they don't know how to use it to it's full potential or have given it to a child. Any photography enthusiast should definitely give instax a go, it's just a lot of fun, highly recommend and can't wait to take it out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Appleby

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: love this camera, I have a standard instax camera as well, much prefer to have the little digital display to tell you how many shots are left and the different modes
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I am not pro at taking pictures but it should still implement some features to cater to someone who isn't great at taking pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my friend and he loves it. So for him giving it a 4 star but for me I can say I wasn't that impressed with it. Wished it didn't make everything too bright or too dark. Maybe I am not pro at taking pictures but it should still implement some features to cater to someone who isn't great at taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. K. GURUNG

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. I was worried about the picture quality but it is very good, the colour isn't perfect but it feels like it's been edited to look that way! The 4 star is because of the price of the film. If you don't bulk buy, it works out 80-90p per picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Great Polaroid camera takes great pictures, only downfall is the price of the refills, will be expensive to refill! Daughter loves it was xmas present she says it's amazing as children are so used to digital photos this takes you back when you see photos like this!
customer_reviews.author: lizroe

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use with no fuss
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my girlfriend who just doesn't do photography, but she's actually started to take photos. Simple and easy to use with no fuss. The selfie mirror is big enough to frame a small group of people and the camera is small and light enough to use 1 handed. My only gripe is that I wish it was usb rechargable or took rechargable batteries. But I knew this before I bought it for her. I use my Instax printer a lot and there doesn't seem to be any diffence in quality with those prints and these so I can't fault it. It's perfect as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic-Winds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pressie for the teenager who has everything !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colour and quality - Bought for my daughter as a Christmas pressie and she loves it ! Only thing she has had to get used to is that there is no preview of a subject shot and it prints out straight away ! Perfect size of prints to add to her led clips in the bedroom :) would highly recommend this as a gift for a teenager that has everything !
customer_reviews.author: The Sarah Appleby TGI Radio Show

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little camera. Was dubious at first as didn't feel like a good quality camera but I was proved so wrong. Really lightweight and compact, easy to put in the film and very clear about what settings you're on. The image quality is superb and it takes seconds for the image to form after you've pressed the shutter button. The image colour and clarity was more than I could have expected, especially as I was in broad sunlight! (Could have easily over exposed). Gorgeous little gadget, a shame it doesn't come with more film!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift was very happy with it. Very cute novelty gift and thr quality is great. The printing paper is very expensive so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: sumit irachande

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade from an older Instax Polaroid model. The self-timer has been the best feature and has proved useful for many occasions when wanting to get everyone in the group in the shot. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with old fashioned polaroids
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with old fashioned polaroids. The selfie option however, is nothing more than a small mirror tile at the front of the camera where you can try and position your face. Not very high tech. Other instant cameras also have a viewing screen on the back and you can wait until you get the perfect picture before you print it out. However, the pictures themselves look nice with the white frame around it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend for her wedding. She wanted this so as not to spend money on a photo booth. Great pictures, easy to use. Great addition to any wedding.
customer_reviews.author: CGO NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good printing quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my sister, she absolutely loves it. Good printing quality, the format is small but it's a love of fun and you can find plenty of accessories to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: extremely easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, extremely easy to use and fun. There is very limited control options on the camera so you should by the higher tier camera if you are looking to manually control exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , great quality pics
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old daughter is loving the instax camera , she got for Christmas. Plus she is learning the different modes on the camera too. Easy to load and use and the instructions are good that she understands. The picture quality is very good when printed.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just in love with this purchase, it’s so fun taking pictures, great quality! The camera came with batteries and a pack of 10 film, also It was delivered before the scheduled day! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera hope my daughter is going to love it...
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Everything works
customer_reviews.text: Everything is on working order... nothing is missing...and nothing to complain about it..I am very pleased with the product itself too
customer_reviews.author: Vittoria

customer_reviews.title: Fun retro instant camera
customer_reviews.text: Good fun camera takes great casual shots. Fun watching them self develop. A reference to a bygone age. Pics very small but will use for parties and events. Otherwise an obsolete idea in this digital age.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyTom

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters birthday she loves it is easy to use lots of pictures and good quality it's amazing for special memories
customer_reviews.author: lina

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for a but of fun. Gifted to my husband to capture those first moments when our first child is born.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and instructions are clear
customer_reviews.text: Stylish little camera. Much prefer the look of the mini 70 to the other versions of instax mini. Easy to set up and instructions are clear. I look forward to taking lots of photos with my new little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Buglass

customer_reviews.title: Faulty goods
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for my niece for Christmas, unfortunately on using the camera on Christmas Day She found it faulty She tryed an alternative film bought separate from the cameras own And again she had faulty pics
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Product was in excellent condition like the seller said, decent quality. Looks almost new. Was bit disappointed I wasn't told it wouldn't come with batteries. But that's okay. I'm really happy with purchase. Would highly recommend. Holding that first polaroid is a feeling you can't describe
customer_reviews.author: kirsty butler

customer_reviews.title: Super instant camera
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to load film and use. Produces instant memories in about 2 mins Amazing to watch them develop
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Very original and smart
customer_reviews.text: It's a very original idea. I've had people asking me at the restaurant about the product and they bought it themselves straight after. The small polaroids are a great idea to give out to friends as memories of time spent together. We are making a scrapbook of memories. The colour, yellow, is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great instant print camera
customer_reviews.text: Good item , easy to use and quality instant pictures . A 5 years old can operate it ( not changing the films ) . Also has selfie mode .
customer_reviews.author: Beausseron

customer_reviews.title: Great little pictures and very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected ... Great little pictures and very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool, fun and my 11year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cool, fun and my 11year old loves it. A bit clunky to handle though- the handstrap keeps getting in the way of the lense if you’re not careful

customer_reviews.title: Faulty film with camera
customer_reviews.text: The supplied film produced no images - only black stains. Amazon do not make it simple for them to supply a replacement film without me sending the camera back as well, which I don't want to do. When a second, additionally purchased, film was inserted the images were fine. Disapointing gift

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 👌
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my sister in law and she loves it

customer_reviews.title: Great wee Instant Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice wee instant camera. Will never take pics the same quality as my Canon DSLR, but great for when the kids have friends round playing or parties etc as they can take pics and give them to their chums

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and honestly, it's the best gift I've ever bought someone. It was to replace a broken instant camera, and the recipient loved it!! highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.text: The film that came with camera was defective and resulted in blank photos. Luckily I purchased additional film and gift wasn't a complete disaster. No possibility to ask partial refund with Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our adult daughter loves it. Specifically purchased so that she can produce memories of our baby grandson.

customer_reviews.title: Got a good quality feel and is well put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for Xmas and she loves it - took it away with us for New Year and she took it everywhere. Got a good quality feel and is well put together , oh, and great photos!!

customer_reviews.title: Half broken product

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great, but the shots included were damaged
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, but the shots included were damaged. Order additional ones just in case. I have managed to get partial refund from amazon but if you are buy as a gift better be on the safe side. Apart from that I am very happy , quality of pictures is very good and very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: After having another more expensive Polaroid camera. This instax is amazing. The quality is amazing (not perfect but it has the nostalgic feel) I love this.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a present. Well received lightweight for carrying ...

customer_reviews.title: Happy :)

customer_reviews.title: SNAPS GALORE!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friend's birthday and it came so quick, next day delivery, brilliant packaging and amazing new quality. She loves it

customer_reviews.text: It's taken the Polaroid into today's world! Really happy with this, only real flaw is that it could be a little more friendly in button placement.

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera

customer_reviews.title: As you’d expect.

customer_reviews.text: Had to return as we could not force the flash off and when the flash came on indoors or outside in dull lighting the picture was too dark. The photo is a picture taken as the sun was going down of our garden patio.

customer_reviews.title: Channelling my inner Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in my favourite colour, and the yellow is so vibrant and beautiful. The film is a tad expensive, and the pictures don't always come out how you expect, but that's what I love about it; Polaroid cameras capture real life, unlike digital cameras where you can retake infinite times to get the "perfect" picture. Life isn't perfect, but it is beautiful. "We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents" - Bob Ross
customer_reviews.author: La.Smith57

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and some great results - my daughter is over the moon

customer_reviews.text: The battery life its low. If I let the batteries in after a month of not using the camera I need to replace them.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, initially had a little issue with not receiving the shots as stated but after contacting the seller the issue was swiftly resolved. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought this for my boyfriend as he loves to take photos. This Polaroid is a perfect size and vibrant colour. Works perfectly every time and comes with 10 shots. It's great to have you're memories come to life in front of you, instantly. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Instax mini 70 Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's rubbish-photos of people animals not recognised very well- Instamatic cameras in the old days picture size just like normal cameras-I didn't realise by the description that pics would be so mini!!! A complete waste of money-not bothering to to buy extra film pack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera for the memories, not on your smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's such a memory! I've not Stopped taking pictures since its arrived! (I bought lots of extra film hehe) Love using this camera, I like giving the pictures to friends aswell as little memories! Only copy of the photo and they can keep it as their memory of the day! Also, as another little memory I add the date and a quote or message to look back on in time 💖🙈 I'm so in love with this camera, I love sharing the memories and having an instant copy of it!

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, flash on ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: Great fun as all the instax cameras but too annoying with the flash, which is impossible to turn off ani will flash automatically when it considers there isn't enough light around (basically all the time). Therefore unable to use it to photograph my daughter as I don't want to blind her. To use only in very bright rooms otherwise everybody will see bright spots. (Covering the flash doesn't work either). Let me know if you have any ideas. Got it for good price on Amazon because it was more compact that previous models but I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NLM

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 70 Instant Film Camera with 10 Shots - Moon White
product_meta.description: Color:Moon White| Product Packaging:Retail PackageDesigned for the selfie enthusiast, the Moon White Instax Mini 70 from Fujifilm is a sleek camera characterized by a range of features for self-portraiture and sharing your instant credit card-sized prints. The camera's design incorporates a retractable two-element Fujinon 60mm f/12.7 lens that permits focusing as closely as 11.8" in macro mode. The optical real image viewfinder has a 0.37x magnification along with a target spot to aid with composition, and the front of the lens incorporates a small mirror to also benefit more accurate selfie compositions. Besides the standard automatic exposure control, with +/- 2/3 EV exposure compensation, the built-in flash can be used in conjunction with an automated exposure mode to adjust shutter speeds for enhanced background detail. A dedicated Selfie shooting mode also automatically adjusts brightness and accounts for the close-up shooting distance of self-portraits and a creative Hi-Key mode brightens the overall exposure for cleaner-looking skin tones. For self-portraits taken at longer than an arm's length, the instax mini 70 also features a tripod mount and a 10 second self-timer. Additionally, for sharing a print with someone, the 2 continuous photo self-timer mode will automatically shoot two frames within the self-timer's duration to provide you a pair of similar prints.
feature_bullets: Five shooting modes, including selfie mode
Real image viewfinder, 0.37x with target spot
Motor driven focusing and built-in automatic electronic flash
Film: (W x H) 54 x 86mm - Picture Size: (W x H) 46 x 62mm
Macro Mode: 0.3m - 0.6m - Power Supply: 2 x CR2/DL CR2 lithium batteries

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
